article_title: Miami lawmaker pushes bill to ban unexpected medical charges for emergency services
article_text:
Numerous consumers have complained to state about unexpected bills

Florida legislator wants to prohibit practice for emergency services

Healthcare providers, insurance companies on opposite sides of debate

article_metadata.news-keywords: health insurance, balance billing, hospitals, doctors, patients, healthcare prices, Florida, emergency room
article_metadata.description: Like most patients, Robert Delfino did what his doctor told him: Go to the hospital for an outpatient cardiac procedure to determine the cause of his heart condition.
article_metadata.title: Miami lawmaker pushes bill to ban unexpected medical charges for emergency services | Miami Herald
